dublin_core.dcvalue: RTBP provides the ability to detect and monitor communicable and non-communicable diseases at the village level through mobile phones. Village level nurses use the mHealthSurvey software to transmit symptoms, suspected and diagnosed diseases to a browser-based statistical analysis software that detects adverse events. Health officials are then notified of adverse events through SMS, email and web.
Nuwan Waidyanatha, Senior Research Fellow, LIRNEasia, Email: nuwan@lirneasia.net | Laurent Elder, Program Officer, IDRC, Email: lelder@idrc.ca
data collection and reporting, Infectious Diseases, Non-communicable Diseases, Malaria and other vector-borne diseases
